bank.assignment

Interface BankSystemAdapterInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BankSystemAdapterGToJ

    public interface BankSystemAdapterInterface
    Adapter class between both implementation of the front end and the backend.
    Since:
    November 09, 2020

        scanner - scanner.
        isManager - true if and only if the requester is a manager
